items.sentence: I could no longer see Tom, but I could hear his footsteps.
I can see that you put a lot of thought into this present.
I bought a book about dinosaurs at a secondhand bookstore.
Except for Tom, the family was all watching TV in silence.
Tom was drunk and said things that he shouldn't have said.
Tom soon realized that there was someone else in the room.
Tom realized that he shouldn't be doing what he was doing.
Tom's parents didn't understand what he was trying to say.
Do you think Tom likes taking the bus to school every day?
Tom knew Mary had told everybody she was going to do that.
